title: HOVERAir HOVER Air X1 Combo Set Self-Flying Camera Pocket-Sized Drone
description:
Ready Stock 100% Brand New & Original

HOVERair X1 Drone

Fitur :
- 3-Second Palm Take-off: Operating the HOVERAir X1 self-flying camera is simple and user-friendly. It takes off from your palm with one click, making it easy to capture moments on the go. It has 32GB of internal storage, eliminating the need for a SD card.

- Portability and Simplicity Redefined: The HOVERAir X1 is the ultimate portable action camera. Weighing just 125g(4.41oz), it's lighter than an iPhone and can be flown without FAA registration. Its foldable and compact design means you can take it with you on all your adventures.

- Automatic and Intelligent Flight Paths: Experience hands-free flying with HOVERAir X1's pre-programmed flight paths, including Hover, Follow, Zoom Out, Orbit, Bird’s Eye, and more. It has a myriad of settings to customize each flight mode to perfectly meet your needs. HOVERAir X1 provides a 11-minute flight time, sufficient for approximately 20 intelligent flights.

- Advanced Tracking and Following: Featuring precise tracking algorithms and following speed of up to 15 Mph, HOVERAir mini drone effortlessly keeps up with you, capturing spectacular moments, making it perfect for cycling and other sports.

- Real-time Monitoring and Manual Control: Through the companion Hover X1 App, you can preview the footage from the drone's camera in real-time. You can also manually control the drone to optimize the flying path and capture the perfect shot.

- Amazing Image & HDR Video Shooting: This selfie drone supports a maximum of 2.7K@30fps and 1080P HDR video shooting. The triple stabilization system ensures smooth video effects even in challenging environments or when you’re on the move like while hiking, biking, skateboarding, and more.

title: Startrc Drone Alarm System for DJI Neo Based on Apple Find My Tracker
description:
Designed for DJI NEO: A dedicated alarm tracker to prevent drone loss or damage due to errors or accidents.

Easy Installation: Adhesive installation ensures a secure fit, lightweight, and does not affect flight performance.

Device Compatibility: Connects via Bluetooth to your Apple device using Apple Find My, no app download required, offering quick and easy tracking.

Powerful Alarm System: Up to 120dB loud alarm and 100-lumen LED light for rapid location identification and precise drone retrieval.

Versatile Application: Compact and portable, ideal for outdoor, rural, orchard, seaside, warehouse, and urban environments, and supports long-term use.

How to Use

1. First Use: Charge fully (red LED on during charging, off when charged).
2. Turning On: Hold power button for 3 seconds (buzzer beeps once, green LED flashes).
3. Turning Off: Hold power button for 5 seconds (buzzer beeps twice, green LED flashes twice).
4. Connect to iPhone: Open “Find My,” tap “Items” > “+” > “Other Items,” select “STARTRC TAG,” tap “Connect,” name the item, and tap “Done.”
5. Resetting: Press power button 4 times, then hold the 5th time until you hear a beep.
6. Trigger Alarm: Tap “Play Sound” in “Find My” or wait 30 minutes for automatic alert.
7. Lost Mode: Enable “Lost Mode” in “Find My” app and input contact info to start tracking.

title: Potensic ATOM 2 Drone with Camera for Adults 4K HDR Video, 8K Photo, Under 249g, 3-Axis Gimbal, 10KM Transmission, AI Track, Vertical Shooting, AI Night Shot, QuickShots
description:
1.【8K Photo, 4K HDR Video】 Equipped with a 1/2'' Sony CMOS sensor, it captures 48MP photos and records 4K/30fps HDR stable videos within a 3-axis gimbal. The F1.8 aperture and 4-in-1 pixels improve low-light performance, details, and color
2.【Under 249g, No Registration Required】 ATOM 2's compact and lightweight design does not need FAA and Remote ID Registration. You can take it to capture exciting moments anytime, anywhere
3.【Brand New Remote, Max 10KM Transmission】 The newly upgraded remote control features a directional antenna for enhanced sensitivity and precision. With built-in PixSync 4.0 technology, the ATOM 2 offers excellent anti-interference with a control range of up to 10 km and 1080p/30fps live view transmission
4.【AI Track & AI Stunning Night Shot】 Powered by our own AI model, ATOM 2 has premium object locking and imagery technology. Frame your target to access tracking modes: Spotlight, Follow, and Parallel. In addition, it makes it easy to capture crisp and clear videos at night
5.【Amazing Visual Experience】 ATOM 2 has various photo modes, like 2.7K Vertical Shooting, 4x digital zoom, and panoramic, and new video modes: Dolly Zoom, Slow Motion, and QuickShots to create cinematic videos. SmartTransfer up to 25 MB/s is ready for sharing on social media
6.【Beginner-friendly Flight】 ATOM 2 offers precise GNSS positioning, a customizable HOME Point, Cruise Control, Auto Takeoff and Landing, and Smart Return-to-Home(RTH), delivering a smooth and enjoyable flying experience
7.【32 Mins Flight】One intelligent 2330mAh battery, running up to 32 minutes.

title: DJI Agras T25 Drone Pertanian - Drone Sprayer Agriculture Penyemprot Pestisida Drone Perkebunan Teh Drone Penyiraman - 1 Unit Baterai
description:
Ini untuk harga 1 unit agras t25 = 140,000,000
Harga 1 baterai = 25,000,000
Harga 1 Baterai Station 22,000,000

Bisa faktur pajak info Lebih lanjut bisa WA 0851-5751-0233

Drone DJI AGRAS T25 menyederhanakan operasi pertanian dengan desainnya yang ringkas, mampu melakukan penyemprotan yang tepat dan penyebaran yang efektif. Drone ini memiliki sistem semprotan atomisasi ganda yang dapat menghasilkan laju aliran hingga 24 L/menit dan mendukung muatan seberat 25 kg, memastikan cakupan yang efisien dan waktu operasional yang lebih singkat di berbagai pengaturan pertanian

Drone DJI AGRAS T25 adalah keajaiban teknik di bidang drone pertanian yang ringkas, memberikan perpaduan sempurna antara fungsionalitas dan kemudahan penggunaan, yang dirancang khusus untuk berbagai kebutuhan pertanian.
Penyemprotan dan Penyebaran Udara yang Canggih
Dilengkapi dengan fitur-fitur canggih, DJI AGRAS T25 unggul dalam operasi penyemprotan dan penyebaran:
Sistem Semprotan Atomisasi Ganda: Mampu menghasilkan laju aliran tinggi hingga 24 L/menit dengan empat nosel opsional, memastikan cakupan yang efektif dengan tetesan yang halus dan seragam.
Penyebar yang Disempurnakan: Menangani hingga 25 kg muatan dengan laju aliran yang tepat sebesar 72 kg/menit, memanfaatkan cakram pemintalan saluran spiral untuk distribusi yang merata .

DJI AGRAS T25 dapat menjangkau hingga 12 hektar per jam. Efisiensi ini memungkinkan cakupan yang cepat dan luas, ideal untuk tugas-tugas pertanian berskala besar.
Operasi Penyebaran: Kapasitas: Drone ini mampu menyebarkan hingga 1000 kg bahan granular per jam. Kapasitas tinggi ini memastikan distribusi material yang cepat dan seragam seperti pupuk atau benih di area yang luas.

Spesifikasi Teknis Berkinerja Tinggi
Kapasitas Penyemprotan: Hingga 20 kg dengan laju aliran 16 L/menit, dapat diperluas hingga 24 L/menit dengan nozel tambahan.
Kapasitas PenyebaranMuatan 25 kg dengan tingkat penyebaran yang efisien sebesar 72 kg/menit.
Komunikasi yang Kuat: Dilengkapi dengan jangkauan 2 km dengan sistem transmisi O3, memastikan kontrol yang stabil dan andal.

Keandalan dan Pemeliharaan
AGRAS T25 telah menjalani pengujian keandalan yang ekstensif untuk memastikan kinerja yang tahan lama dalam penggunaan intensif:
Perawatan yang mudah: Fitur pembongkaran cepat memungkinkan pembersihan dan perawatan yang mudah.
Daya Tahan Terbukti: Dibuat untuk tahan terhadap tugas-tugas pertanian yang berat, memastikan stabilitas operasional jangka panjang.
Keunggulan Navigasi di Medan yang Berat
AGRAS T25 sangat cocok untuk lingkungan yang menantang:
Penghindaran Rintangan Tingkat Lanjut: Dilengkapi dengan radar phased-array depan dan belakang serta sistem penglihatan teropong, yang meningkatkan keamanan dan keandalan selama penerbangan.
Kemampuan Mengikuti Medan: Secara otomatis menyesuaikan untuk mempertahankan ketinggian optimal pada lanskap yang tidak rata hingga kemiringan 50°, sempurna untuk medan berbukit.

title: [READY STOK] DJI O4 Pro Lite Air Unit FPV Drone Video System
description:
Summary
The DJI O4 Air Unit redefines video transmission with improved resolution, lower latency, and extended range. At just 8.2 grams, it integrates a 1/2-inch image sensor that records 4K/60fps video, delivering an ideal combination of performance and portability.

Features
Works with DJI Goggles 2, DJI Goggles Integra, DJI Goggles 3, or DJI Goggles N3
Compatible with DJI FPV Remote Controller 2 or 3
Lightweight FHD FPV Digital Video Transmission
20 ms Low Latency, 10 km Range
1/2-inch CMOS Image Sensor
4K/60fps Video Recording
1080p/100fps Live View
8.2g Lightweight Body

LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN
The DJI O4 Air Unit can fit drone frames of 2 inches and smaller, supporting flexible assembly to suit various creative flight scenarios. Experience the thrill of flying while capturing high-quality footage with ease.

VISUALLY STRIKING
The DJI O4 Air Unit Series is capable of recording 4K/60fps video. The video transmission system utilizes H.265 video encoding, supporting high-frame-rate transmission at 1080p/100fps, ensuring clear and smooth real-time imagery. No matter how fast you fly, the camera view keeps up.

RACING MODE
The DJI O4 introduces a new Racing mode, with video transmission latency as low as 20 milliseconds. It supports up to eight aircraft racing simultaneously, taking you on an exhilarating, high-speed journey through the skies.

CANVAS MODE
The DJI O4 Air Unit supports Canvas Mode and Betaflight OSD settings. You can customize the real-time data and layout displayed on your goggles screen, making flight data clear at a glance and enhancing your control precision.

title: BETAFPV Pavo Pico HD Digital Whoop FPV Drone DJI O3 Vista Link Walksnail Avatar Batch 2
description:
Now, the second batch has been restocked!

Thanks to all the enthusiastic pilots who participated in the BETA TEST before, we've now released the smallest 2S about 100g DJI O3 Cinewhoop! This ultra-light cinewhoop with a small wheelbase is not only equipped with 45mm propellers but also the latest F4 2-3S 20A AIO FC V1 which greatly heightens the flying experience. Due to Its split design HD VTX mounting bracket, it supports quick installation of mainstream HD digital VTX modules and a rubber damper vibration-damping design with GyroFlow stabilization software ensures stable and smooth HD images. Its design is well-suited for cruising indoors and outdoors alike.

We upgraded the FC board since the second batch, details are below:
-Stable 9V 2A BEC power for the DJI O3 HD VTX, preventing disruptions caused by low battery voltage.
-Improve ESC to 20A and a peak current of 25A, allowing it to handle special situations like motor blockage or stalling.
-Connector for DJI O3 HD VTX and USB port for easy installation and maintenance.

Specification
Items: Pavo Pico Brushless Whoop Quadcopter
Color: Black
Flight Time*: 4min
Wheelbase: 80.8mm
Battery*: LAVA 2S 450mAh 75C Battery
FC*: F4 2-3S 20A AIO FC V1(Since second batch)

Motor: 1102 | 14000kv red and black (2022)

RX Version: Serial ELRS/TBS
FPV Camera: Support DJI O3 Camera, Caddx Series, RUNCAM Series 19mm/20mm Camera, Avatar HD Pro Camera
Note: The flight time is calculated under 8.4V~6.8V. The battery will be upgraded from 450mAh 2S Battery to LAVA 2S 450mAh 75C Battery from Feb 2024, and the second batch of FC starts in Aug 2023.

Mengganti Baterai Drone :
- Masukkan baterai ke dalam kabel USB yg di berikan dalam paket Drone
- Lepaskan baterai dari Drone
- sambungkan kabel ke adaptor charger. Lampu merah menandakan sedang mengisi daya
- Isi Daya baterai sekitar 120 menit.

- Setelah baterai yang sudah di charger di masukkan ke dalam drone, tekan tombol on, lalu lampu merah biru akan berkedip ( pastikan baterai terisi penuh)

- Arahkan joystick kiri ke atas lalu tarik kembali ke sisi bawah
- Remot sudah terhubung dengan drone dan siap di kendalikan.
Kalibrasi :
- dorong joystick kiri ke aarah atas untuk menghidupkan drone ( tidak membuat drone terbang)
- dorong kembali joystick ke atas untuk membiarkan drone terbang

title: Flywoo Circular Polarized 5G8 UFL Antenna RHCP for Analog Drone VTX
description:
Flywoo Circular Antenna is the smallest and lightest circular polarized antennas on the market. Only 1.6g (without Tube) . perfect for both lightweight racing builds or freestyle quads Or LR drone .

Features
Flywoo Circular antenna housing is made out of injected molded polycarbonate ,to avoid buying fragile stock antennas again and again...
circularly polarized and has excellent multipath rejection capability . Effectively suppress screen flicker caused by multi-path interference. ( Multipath interference is the most common reason for bad video quality, in the form of random color change, static, scrambled image and drop-outs. It happens when the signal is reflected from object and gets distorted with phase delay, and it interferes with the main signal. )
Have an amazing max gain of 2.2dBic , Significantly Improved Range with a Higher Gain
Works great as both a transmitting or receiving antenna
Virtually Perfect Axial Ratio
Extended Wire Length
Specifications
Gain: 2.2dBi
Axial ratio: 1.0 Around
Band Width: 5.6Ghz – 6.2GHz
Axial Ratio: Around 1.0
Polarization: LHCP or RHCP
Connector: UFL
Weight: 1.6g (without Tube)

Resolusi foto (kamera depan) 3840*2160 P

Fitur:
1. Lensa depan ditempatkan dengan WIFI definisi tinggi 6K sudut lebar, lensa definisi tinggi bawah dengan aliran optik dapat mengalihkan sudut kamera, kemiringan panci servo dirancang untuk meningkatkan stabilitas, dan anti-guncang elektronik EIS ditambahkan untuk membuat garis foto lebih jelas
2. Tinggi memperbaiki fungsi memiliki tinggi menjaga fungsi mode, dan pemosisian aliran optik dan fungsi tetap-titik memiliki penerbangan stabil.
3. Daya tahan Ultra panjang 3.7V 1800mAh baterai Li ion, yang dapat bertahan sekitar 18 menit,
4. Menyesuaikan rute. Anda dapat menggambar gambar yang ingin Anda terbang di aplikasi
5. Kontrol aplikasi ponsel, satu tombol kembali, mode tanpa kepala, naik dan turun, maju dan mundur, penerbangan sisi kiri dan kanan
6. Fotografi gerakan tangan, pemosisian aliran optik, motor tanpa sikat, daya tahan ultra panjang, rakitan kepala menghindari rintangan, yang dapat berhenti ketika menghadapi rintangan tanpa bertabrakan dengannya
7. motor tanpa sikat memberikan daya yang lebih kuat dan umur pemakaian yang lebih lama
8. Ukuran dan berat produk ringan, dan berat badan adalah 123g, yang dapat menghindari kontrol penerbangan nasional (beberapa negara memerlukan sertifikasi atau pendaftaran untuk UAV lebih dari 250g, dan 210g dapat menghilangkan tantangan sertifikasi dan pendaftaran)
9. Teknologi anti-interferensi 2.4GHz, giroskop enam sumbu, penerbangan lebih stabil, kontrol lebih nyaman.

Features:

2. Foldable and Easy to Carry: This mini foldable drone has foldable arms can be stored into the controller, which is small and easy to carry.
3.One Key Take off / Landing:The drone automatically hovers at a set altitude after take-off and before landing making it easy to control and maneuver, especially for beginners who are not yet skilled.
4.Headless Mode : Enable players of any level to fly and operate the rc toy drone easily.
5.Trajectory Marking: With mobile phone control, you can turn on Track Indicator Flight to draw the flight path you want and the drone will fly according to the track you’ve drawn.
6. Stunt Roll: The mini drone can stunt during flying at 360 degree, offering you a great visual experience.
7. 4K pixel HD Drone Camera with Real-Time Transmission: Surprisingly, this photography drone with camera 4K hd can capture stunning pictures and videos from the sky. With 2.4G WiFi transmission, you can connect to the APP, and take photos, videos and real-time transmission through the phone camera image.

title: GKA Li-Ion Liion Battery batre 6S 22.2V 3000mAh 40A RC Plane Drone
description: PERHATIAN, MOHON DIBACA TERLEBIH DAHULU YA.... MOHON MAAF UNTUK SEMENTARA GRATIS ONGKIR DI NON AKTIFKAN Karena banyak paket yang dioper melalui Lion Parcel, Jadi selalu di kembalikan Pengiriman hanya bisa menggunakan JNE Harga yang tertera adalah Harga resmi yang sudah ditambah biaya tambahan Tokopedia sebesar 6.5% Pengiriman Battery bisa mengguanakn JNE (Semua servis) ke seluruh wilayah Indonesia, Untuk JNE YES bisa juga tapi kebanyakan tidak lulus XRay dan otomatis akan dialihkan lewat darat (waktu pengiriman lebih lama), Tapi terkadang saat tidak lulus XRay, besok nya bisa sampai juga ke kota tujuan (nah ini saya kurang tau kenapa bisa begini). Jadi mohon pengertiannya untuk pengiriman battery memang lebih lama dari biasanya. Jadilah pembeli yang bijak, mohon kesabarannya karena batre tidak seperti barang biasa untuk pengirimannya, jika perlu URGENT, harap komunikasikan ke kami terlebih dahulu. Kenapa GKA Battery? *) Menggunakan Battery BARU dan berkualitas (ORIGINAL/AUTHENTIC BATTERY) *) Menggunakan kabel Full silicone baik discharge maupun balance port *) Battery Fresh Rakitan (bukan stok lama yang disimpan) *) DI SOLDER bukan pakai spot weld, jadi arus dijamin mantab, tidak korosi, dan sambungan dijamin awet *) Battery PASTI di test sebelum dikirim, untuk memastikan kualitas *) Bisa Request Konektor (silahkan PM untuk ketersediaan konektor yang di inginkan) *) Bisa Request kapasitas (silahkan PM jika membutuhkan kapasitas dan voltase batery yang diperlukan) Spesifikasi: Type Battery: LiIon Konfigurasi: 6S1P Kapasitas: 2100mAh/2600mAh/3000mAh/3400mAh (Silahkan pilih sesuai varian) Voltase: 22.2V Berat: 310gr Dimensi: 55x33x73mm Connector: XT60 (selain XT60 Silahkan tinggalkan pesan) Continues Discharge: 20A Burst discharge: 40A Charging Current: under 2A FAQ: Q: Charging pakai mode apa ya? A: Charging pakai mode LiPo 4.20V ya kak. Q: Kog 4.20V, Bukannya 4.10V ya buat Liion A: Untuk Battery Liion saat ini (yang saya pakai) Full nya memang 4.20V kak, beda dengan Liion jaman dahulu yang hanya 4.10V, bahkan ada juga liion yang sampai 4.35V Q: Untuk Storage nya bagaimana ya? A: Storage sama seperti LiPo, bisa di range 3.6-3.9V. Q: Landing (habis) di berapa volt ya? A: Untuk LiIon Habisnya di 2.8V/Cell ya kak, untuk landing volltage nanti tergantung load nya, tapi biasanya antara 3.1-2.9V/cell

title: DarwinFPV CineApe 25 Analog Cinematic Whoop FPV Drone PNP No RX BNF
description:
CineApe25 is DarwinFPV’s first cinematic whoop FPV drone. The frame is composed of upper and lower carbon plates and a high-strength injection guard, which is very strong and crash-resistant and easy to disassemble. The motor adopts 1504-3600KV long-life motor; we abandoned the traditional AIO solution and adopted the split design of F4+30A stack to reduce the maintenance cost in the future. The accessories adopt mature and stable solutions to maximize the durability and reliability of the drone.

CineApe25 is a very cost-effective whoop FPV drone. It not only solves the worries of beginners about the high risk factors and high threshold of assembly, but also improves the after-sales experience. If you are still struggling with which FPV drone to buy, DarwinFPV CineApe25 may be your best choice!
